attributes.action: ensure that hte Information Commission makes decision in a reasonable time.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When consumers are faced with data protection issues they are often faced with huge delays by the Information Commission. Currently consumers have to wait more than a year for a decision. We want the Prime Minister to make sure that the Information Commisssion is working in a timely manner and protect consumers without any delays.
